title: An experiment in audio
author: VD
content_html: The first Vox Tox is up on voxday.net. It pretty much blows – what do you expect from a complete amateur with nothing but a headset mike and a computer – but check it out if you’re so inclined and let me know what you think.
content_text:
The first Vox Tox is up on
voxday.net
.  It pretty much blows – what do you expect from a complete amateur with nothing but a headset mike and a computer – but check it out if you’re so inclined and let me know what you think.
